text: Alena Brooks (born 14 November 1991) is a middle-distance runner from Trinidad and Tobago specialising in the 800 metres. She represented her country at two editions of Commonwealth Games and two editions of Pan American Games. In addition, she won a silver medal at the 2018 Central American and Caribbean Games. ==International competitions== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |rowspan=2|2009 |rowspan=2|CARIFTA Games (U20)
